See the * License for the specific language governing rights and limitations * under the License. * The Original Code is Openbravo ERP. * The Initial Developer of the Original Code is Openbravo SLU * All portions are Copyright (C) 2001-2006 Openbravo SLU * All Rights Reserved. * Contributor(s): ______________________________________. ************************************************************************/ v_Display VARCHAR2(4000) ; v_SQL VARCHAR2(4000):=''; BEGIN SELECT REPLACE(REPLACE(SQL_RECORD_IDENTIFIER, ':c_language', '''' || p_Language || ''''), ':c_ID', p_Record_ID) INTO v_SQL FROM AD_TABLE WHERE UPPER(TABLENAME)=UPPER(p_TableName) ; EXECUTE IMMEDIATE v_SQL INTO v_Display; /* IF (p_Language=NULL OR p_Language='' ) THEN v_Display:='**'; END IF;*/ -- << END_PROCESS >> RETURN v_Display; EXCEPTION WHEN OTHERS THEN RETURN '**'; END AD_COLUMN_IDENTIFIER
